{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=SR20 |asin= |price=249.99 |fcc_date=11/07/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Proware |type=wireless router, IoT hub |fcc_id=TE7SR20 |ic_id=8853A-SR20 |pcb_id=1601082SR20LCD |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709A0;BCM4709A0KFEBG, TT1551 P10, 559834-06 Z1D; |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |cpu2_brand=STMicroelectronics |cpu2_model=STM32F429II |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=ESMT |fla1_model=F59L1G81MA-25T |fla2=32 |fla2_brand=Winbond |fla2_model=W25Q256FVFG |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SD Card slot |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SKY2623L;SKY, 2623L, 551LB;3; ,,, 5GHz WLAN Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY85405;SKY85405, 541LH, 1541 MY;3; ,,, ZigBee Proprietary 2.4 GHz Communications SoC;TI;CC2530;;1; ,,, 2.4 GHz Range Extender/RF Front End Module;TI;CC2592;;1; ,,, Z-Wave SoC/Transciever;Sigma Designs;ZM5101;ZM5101A-CME3, A703427 1, 1529 TWN;1; |flags=256QAM, ZigBee, Z-Wave, touchscreen, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|AC1900 Smart Home Router with Touch Screen}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.tp-link.com/us/SR20/}}
*Web GUI: http://tplinkwifi.net
"1601082'''SR20'''LCD ''Rev1.0sp1''" is silkscreened :on the main board in the FCC photos. "1601282'''SR20'''LCD ''Rev1.0sp1''" is silkscreened :on the LCD board in the FCC photos.
LCD Board holds: 4.3‚Äù touchscreen display *MCU: [[STMicroelectronics]] STM32F429II *Flash: ''Winbond'' 25Q64FVSIG (8MB) *RAM: ''ESMT'' M12L2561616A-6TI (32MB)
